Articles.Content: Is there any way to get the source code for the stock PartModules? It would really help me in making a mod i am planning to do, which would add (internal combustion) engines to drive rover wheels, but i'm sure the code would help many others, not only being used as base for a mod, but as example code for learning how stuff is done with the KSP API.

Is there any way to get the source code for the stock PartModules? It would really help me in making a mod i am planning to do, which would add (internal combustion) engines to drive rover wheels, but i'm sure the code would help many others, not only being used as base for a mod, but as example code for learning how stuff is done with the KSP API.

KSP is not open source, so not there is no legal way to get it.
